aria.root: This is a modal window. To close this window use the cancel button or press escape or submit the modal by using the submit button.
This is a confirm modal. You can either confirm or cancel your last action.

default.title: Confirm action
default.text: Do you really want to perform this action?

aria.move-success: Item was successfully moved from index {from} to {to}
aria.drag-toggle-button: Activates draggable buttons in calendar plan list items

filter.empty: No entries found for given filter.

common.show_password: Show password as plain text. Warning: this will display your password on the screen.

confirm.text: Do you really want to archive this tag?
Do you really want to add this tag from archive?

help.includeOnFilter: This option will hide tagged items in some views unless a matching filter is selected.

email.text: Please enter the verification code sent to your email address. The code is only valid for a short time, so please enter it soon.
email.text_with_address: Please enter the verification code sent to {email}. The code is only valid for a short time, so please enter it soon.

errors.attempts: The given verification code is invalid, please try again.
errors.maxAttempts: You have exceeded the maximum number of attempts, please use the resend button to generate a new verification code.

remember_me_info.p1: Choosing this option reduces the number of times you're asked to Sign-In on this device.
remember_me_info.p2: To keep your account secure, use this option only on your personal devices.

verify_email.title: Verify your email
verify_email.text: We've sent a verification email to: {email}
verify_email.subtext: Click the link in your email to activate your account.

messages.no-organization-relation: You are not a member of any organization.

error.404: The requested service could not be found.
